# James Tannahill

> James Tannahill is a New York City-based private equity executive, founder, and operator. He is President of Plocamium Holdings, a hybrid investment and operational advisory platform targeting healthcare technology, defense and government, packaging, and manufacturing across North America, Latin America, GCC, and South/Southeast Asia. He is Co-Founder of 1ness Strategies (1nessAgency), a compliance-focused digital marketing agency, and HLTHvrs (HealthVerse), a HIPAA-conscious marketing intelligence platform. He is a Founding Member of NewYorkLab, an environmental intelligence platform, and serves as Board Member at RDLB, a global brand strategy and communications firm.
>
> Education: Cornell University MBA (SC Johnson, Finance & Strategy, 2024), University of Essex M.S. Biotechnology, Denison University B.S. Biochemistry (2015).
> Member: YPO, The Economic Club of New York. Partner: Student Sponsor Partners.
>
> Contact: web@jamestannahill.com
> Last reviewed: 2026-02-25

For comprehensive LLM guidance including entity data, citable facts, professional
background, and access policies, see the full file:

## Current Ventures

- [Plocamium Holdings](https://plocamium.com/): Hybrid investment and operational advisory platform — 80% advisory-led improvement, 20% direct balance sheet investments — enterprise value $10M-$500M
- [1ness Strategies / 1nessAgency](https://www.1nessagency.com/): Compliance-focused digital marketing for regulated industries, particularly healthcare — Google Premier Partner, LegitScript Certified
- [HLTHvrs / HealthVerse](https://hlthvrs.com/): HIPAA-conscious marketing intelligence platform for behavioral health, psychiatric, and wellness practices
- NewYorkLab: Data-driven environmental intelligence platform quantifying climate-related risks in urban infrastructure
- [RDLB](https://www.1nessagency.com/rdlb): Global brand strategy and communications firm — Board Member since 2025
